Segment.name: SCR
Segment.comment: Indicates the type and quantity of rail equipment being ordered for transportation services

Field.name: Quantity
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: CarTypeCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying type of rail car or intermodal equipment type and its general characteristics

Field.name: EquipmentLength
Field.comment: Length (in feet and inches) of equipment ordered or used to transport shipment (The format is FFFII where FFF is feet and II is inches; the range for II is 00 through 11)

Field.name: Height1
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width1
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: WeightCapacity
Field.comment: Capacity of car ordered (stated in 1000 pound units or 1000 kilogram units)

Field.name: CubicCapacity
Field.comment: Capacity of car ordered (cubic feet unless otherwise specified)

Field.name: ProtectiveServiceRuleCode
Field.comment: Association of American Railroads (AAR) Protective Service that applies to shipment

Field.name: FloorTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of floor for equipment

Field.name: Height2
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width2
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: DoorTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of door on a railcar

Field.name: RatingSummaryValueCode
Field.comment: The total overall rating

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: StandardCarrierAlphaCode1
Field.comment: Standard Carrier Alpha Code

Field.name: CarTypeCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying type of rail car or intermodal equipment type and its general characteristics

Field.name: AssociationOfAmericanRailroads
Field.comment: Code identifying a pool of equipment assigned to a specific shipper

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: StandardCarrierAlphaCode2
Field.comment: Standard Carrier Alpha Code

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber1
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: EquipmentNumber2
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)
